title: Update landing page UI to match provided MAGICAL SERVICE HTML layout

requirements.text: Update `frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx` to match the structure, layout, Tailwind classes, and user-facing copy from the provided HTML snippet: sticky top navbar with text-only brand ("MAGICAL SERVICE" + "Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar") and a phone CTA; add a hero section (blue background) with heading "Professional Cleaning Service", subheading "Trusted Experts in Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar", and a primary "WhatsApp Inquiry" button linking to `https://wa.me/918000262644`; then render the "Our Service Rates" section with an underlined title and four service-rate cards (Sofa/AC Jet/Mattress/Carpet-Chair) using the same rounded corners, borders, and hover translate/transition behavior as the snippet; then render the 3-item benefits strip with the same mobile border-top behavior; then render the UPI + review section with "Scan to Pay (UPI)", QR image URL exactly as provided, and "UPI ID: jrg7311@okicici"; keep the floating WhatsApp button at bottom-right linking to `https://wa.me/918000262644`.

quotes: Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar
Our Service Rates
Scan to Pay (UPI)

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders the navbar, hero, service rates grid, benefits strip, UPI/review section, and WhatsApp floating button in the same order as the provided HTML snippet.
All user-facing text matches the provided snippet exactly (including capitalization for headings like "MAGICAL SERVICE" and "Scan to Pay (UPI)").
Links match the snippet exactly: phone uses `tel:+918000262644`, WhatsApp uses `https://wa.me/918000262644`, review uses `https://share.google/CAZwztDsnRKHBaOAM`.
Service cards have hover lift behavior consistent with the snippet (`hover:-translate-y-2` and transition).
UPI QR image uses the exact external `api.qrserver.com` URL from the snippet and displays the UPI ID text as "UPI ID: jrg7311@okicici".

requirements.text: Replace any FontAwesome `<i class="...">` icon usage implied by the provided HTML with the existing project icon approach (e.g., `lucide-react` and/or `react-icons` already used in `LandingPage.tsx`), while keeping the visual intent (phone icon, WhatsApp icon, sofa/snowflake/bed/rug-like icons, shield/bolt/wallet-like icons).
acceptanceCriteria: No FontAwesome dependency is introduced for this change.
All icons render without runtime errors and are visually representative of the intended meaning (phone, WhatsApp, service icons, benefit icons).

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only shadcn/ui components).
Do not edit any paths listed in `SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths`.
nonGoals: Do not add or modify backend (Motoko) canister logic.
Do not add new authentication flows or change Internet Identity integration.
Do not add external third-party messaging integrations beyond the existing WhatsApp link URLs.
